summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4074 for the improvement of Hudson Street, from 50th Avenue South to a point 120 feet east of 53rd Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and graveling and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49075, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
